Shade:AnimateDead.NAME: Animate Dead
Shade:AnimateDead.DESCRIPTION: Summon 1 zombie and 2 skeletons. NL Exhaust.
Shade:AnimateDead.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon 2 zombies and 1 skeleton. NL Exhaust.

Shade:ClawBack.NAME: Claw Back
Shade:ClawBack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Return a random exhausted class card to your draw pile.
Shade:ClawBack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Return a random exhausted class card to your draw pile.

Shade:AblativeArmor.NAME: Ablative Armor
Shade:AblativeArmor.DESCRIPTION: Sacrifice a zombie to apply !M! Weak to all enemies and gain 1 Dexterity.
Shade:AblativeArmor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Sacrifice a zombie to apply !M! Weak to all enemies and gain 1 Dexterity.

Shade:Boneskin.NAME: Boneskin
Shade:Boneskin.DESCRIPTION: Sacrifice your skeletons. Gain !M! plated armor for each skeleton sacrificed.
Shade:Boneskin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Sacrifice your skeletons. Gain !M! plated armor for each skeleton sacrificed.

Shade:FreshBones.NAME: Fresh Bones
Shade:FreshBones.DESCRIPTION: Summon 1 skeleton. NL Your skeletons deal 3 more damage for !M! turn.
Shade:FreshBones.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon 1 skeleton. NL Your skeletons deal 3 more damage for !M! turns.

Shade:TouchOfTheGrave.NAME: Touch of the Grave
Shade:TouchOfTheGrave.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a random exhausted attack and remove it from play.
Shade:TouchOfTheGrave.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, play a random exhausted attack and remove it from play.

Shade:CallOfTheGrave.NAME: Call of the Grave
Shade:CallOfTheGrave.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a random exhausted skill and remove it from play.
Shade:CallOfTheGrave.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, play a random exhausted skill and remove it from play.

Shade:Bonestorm.NAME: Bonestorm
Shade:Bonestorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Summon 1 skeleton.
Shade:Bonestorm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Summon 2 skeletons.

Shade:FingerOfDeath.NAME: Finger of Death
Shade:FingerOfDeath.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If it kills the target, summon a zombie.
Shade:FingerOfDeath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If it kills the target, summon a zombie.

Shade:RavenousHorde.NAME: Ravenous Horde
Shade:RavenousHorde.DESCRIPTION: Summon X zombies. NL If this summons 3 or more, summon a skeleton.
Shade:RavenousHorde.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon X+1 zombies. NL If this summons 3 or more, summon a skeleton.

Shade:LichForm.NAME: Lich Form
Shade:LichForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, summon !M! zombies and !M! skeletons.
Shade:LichForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, summon !M! zombies and !M! skeletons.

Shade:CallWraith.NAME: Call Wraith
Shade:CallWraith.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Summon a wraith. NL Exhaust
Shade:CallWraith.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Summon a wraith. NL Exhaust

Shade:RitualOffering.NAME: Ritual Offering
Shade:RitualOffering.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! cards from your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
Shade:RitualOffering.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! cards from your draw pile. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

Shade:Frenzy.NAME: Frenzy
Shade:Frenzy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and Dexterity until next turn. NL Exhaust.
Shade:Frenzy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and Dexterity until next turn. NL Exhaust.

Shade:ExtraLimbs.NAME: Extra Limbs
Shade:ExtraLimbs.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Increase the number of strikes by 1 this combat. NL Exhaust.
Shade:ExtraLimbs.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Increase the number of strikes by 1 this combat. NL Exhaust.

Shade:SelfBurial.NAME: Self-burial
Shade:SelfBurial.DESCRIPTION: Exchange ALL unexhausted cards for your exhausted ones. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.
Shade:SelfBurial.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exchange ALL unexhausted cards for your exhausted ones. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

Shade:GraveBargain.NAME: Grey Bargain
Shade:GraveBargain.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand to return an exhausted card to your draw pile. NL Draw a card.
Shade:GraveBargain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand to return an exhausted card to your draw pile. NL Draw a card.

Shade:FleshLikeOak.NAME: Flesh Like Oak
Shade:FleshLikeOak.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.
Shade:FleshLikeOak.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

Shade:CloudOfShrapnel.NAME: Cloud of Shrapnel
Shade:CloudOfShrapnel.DESCRIPTION: Sacrifice a skeleton to deal !D! damage to all enemies and gain !M! Dexterity. NL Exhaust.
Shade:CloudOfShrapnel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Sacrifice a skeleton to deal !D! damage to all enemies and gain !M! Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

Shade:SanguineRitual.NAME: Sanguine Ritual
Shade:SanguineRitual.DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 HP. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Exhaust.
Shade:SanguineRitual.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 HP. NL Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Exhaust.

Shade:FuneraryJewels.NAME: Funerary Jewels
Shade:FuneraryJewels.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Draw !M! cards. Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.
Shade:FuneraryJewels.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Draw !M! cards. Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.

Shade:DangerousRitual.NAME: Dangerous Ritual
Shade:DangerousRitual.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Costs 1 less for every !M! cards exhausted this combat.
Shade:DangerousRitual.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Costs 1 less for every !M! cards exhausted this combat.

Shade:OminousRitual.NAME: Ominous Ritual
Shade:OminousRitual.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block and deal damage to all enemies equal to the number of cards exhausted this combat.
Shade:OminousRitual.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block and deal damage to all enemies equal to the number of cards exhausted this combat.

Shade:CommandSoldier.NAME: Command Soldier
Shade:CommandSoldier.DESCRIPTION: Summon a skeleton and trigger its attack.
Shade:CommandSoldier.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon a skeleton and trigger all skeleton attacks.

Shade:LyeBath.NAME: Lye Bath
Shade:LyeBath.DESCRIPTION: Convert all your zombies into skeletons. NL Draw a card.
Shade:LyeBath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Convert all your zombies into skeletons. NL Draw a card for each one.

Shade:GoDigging.NAME: Go Digging
Shade:GoDigging.DESCRIPTION: Sacrifice up to !M! skeletons. At the start of next turn, summon 2 zombies for each one sacrificed.
Shade:GoDigging.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Sacrifice up to !M! skeletons. At the start of next turn, summon 2 zombies for each one sacrificed.

Shade:AuraOfUnlife.NAME: Aura of Unlife
Shade:AuraOfUnlife.DESCRIPTION: Your zombies and skeletons take one turn longer to decay.
Shade:AuraOfUnlife.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your zombies and skeletons take two turns longer to decay.

Shade:GraveStillness.NAME: Grave Stillness
Shade:GraveStillness.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Your skeletons and zombies don't decay this turn.
Shade:GraveStillness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Your skeletons and zombies don't decay this turn.

Shade:PotionOfRestlessness.NAME: Potion of Restlessness
Shade:PotionOfRestlessness.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Strength. NL Your zombies and skeletons decay one turn quicker.
Shade:PotionOfRestlessness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 Strength. NL Your zombies and skeletons decay one turn quicker.

Shade:GreaterAnimation.NAME: Greater Animation
Shade:GreaterAnimation.DESCRIPTION: Summon !M! zombies, !M! skeletons, and 1 wraith. NL Lose 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity.
Shade:GreaterAnimation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon !M! zombies, !M! skeletons, and 1 wraith. NL Lose 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity.

Shade:OfferingToTheBeyond.NAME: Offering to the Beyond
Shade:OfferingToTheBeyond.DESCRIPTION: The next time you exhaust !M! cards in one turn, summon a wraith.
Shade:OfferingToTheBeyond.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next time you exhaust !M! cards in one turn, summon a wraith.

Shade:OpenGraves.NAME: Open Graves
Shade:OpenGraves.DESCRIPTION: Summon either a zombie or a skeleton at the beginning of your turn, alternating.
Shade:OpenGraves.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon a skeleton. NL Summon either a zombie or a skeleton at the beginning of your turn, alternating.

Shade:SensePrey.NAME: Sense Prey
Shade:SensePrey.DESCRIPTION: Summon a skeleton for each enemy in combat. NL Exhaust.
Shade:SensePrey.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Summon a skeleton for each enemy in combat. NL Exhaust

Shade:Trample.NAME: Trample
Shade:Trample.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each of your zombies.
Shade:Trample.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each of your zombies.

Shade:PressTheAttack.NAME: Press the Attack
Shade:PressTheAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies, plus !M! for each of your zombies and skeletons.
Shade:PressTheAttack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies, plus !M! for each of your zombies and skeletons.

Shade:Patience.NAME: Patience
Shade:Patience.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain your hand and your unspent energy this turn.

Shade:Awaken.NAME: Awaken
Shade:Awaken.DESCRIPTION: Choose an exhausted card. At the start of next turn, return it to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Shade:Awaken.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose an exhausted card. At the start of next turn, return it to your hand. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

Shade:Haruspicy.NAME: Haruspicy
Shade:Haruspicy.DESCRIPTION: Scry 4 and draw 2 cards. NL Sacrifice a zombie or lose 5 HP.
Shade:Haruspicy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Scry 5 and draw 3 cards. NL Sacrifice a zombie or lose 5 HP.

Shade:Brains.NAME: Brains
Shade:Brains.DESCRIPTION: Summon a zombie. NL Draw !M! cards.
Shade:Brains.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon a zombie. NL Draw !M! cards.

Shade:ScuttlingHand.NAME: Scuttling Hand
Shade:ScuttlingHand.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you exhaust a card, return this from the discard pile to your hand.
Shade:ScuttlingHand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you exhaust a card, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

Shade:Premonition.NAME: Premonition
Shade:Premonition.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you summon a wraith, move this to your hand from wherever it is.
Shade:Premonition.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you summon a wraith, move this to your hand from wherever it is.

Shade:SkeletonHug.NAME: Skeleton Hug
Shade:SkeletonHug.DESCRIPTION: Summon a skeleton. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 2 Weak and 1 Vulnerable.
Shade:SkeletonHug.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon a skeleton. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 3 Weak and 2 Vulnerable.

Shade:BoneShards.NAME: Bone Shards
Shade:BoneShards.DESCRIPTION: Sacrifice up to !M! skeletons to deal !D! damage each.
Shade:BoneShards.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Sacrifice up to !M! skeletons to deal !D! damage each.

Shade:CoffinDance.NAME: Coffin Dance
Shade:CoffinDance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have exactly 4 zombies and skeletons combined, summon a skeleton.
Shade:CoffinDance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have exactly 4 zombies and skeletons combined, summon a skeleton and gain [E].

Shade:UnbarTheGrave.NAME: Unbar the Grave
Shade:UnbarTheGrave.DESCRIPTION: Summon !M! zombies and !M! skeletons. NL Return !M! random exhausted cards to your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
Shade:UnbarTheGrave.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon !M! zombies and !M! skeletons. NL Return !M! random exhausted cards to your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
